**感知头盔**（helm of telepathy）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[头盔](/wiki/%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "头盔")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成的[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## 生成

[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有7⁄200（3.5%）的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件感知头盔[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")和[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物的起始头盔有3⁄8的概率被替换成感知头盔，因此他们生成时获得感知头盔的总概率约为39.69%[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 描述

感知头盔的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，并提供外在[心灵感应](/index.php?title=%E5%BF%83%E7%81%B5%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "心灵感应 (page does not exist)")。穿戴头盔不会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")之。虽然在功能上是增强心灵的，感知头盔仍和其他金属头盔一样会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")。

## 策略

- *主条目：[心灵感应](/index.php?title=%E5%BF%83%E7%81%B5%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "心灵感应 (page does not exist)")*

外在心灵感应对于[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")而言有一定实用性，但并不是必需的，没有必要在其上耗费[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")。不过，感知头盔常常被一些能提供同样特质的[任务神器](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "任务神器 (page does not exist)")（例如[岩德至尊白金卡](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E8%87%B3%E5%B0%8A%E7%99%BD%E9%87%91%E5%8D%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德至尊白金卡 (page does not exist)")和[艾奇奥匹亚之眼](/index.php?title=%E8%89%BE%E5%A5%87%E5%A5%A5%E5%8C%B9%E4%BA%9A%E4%B9%8B%E7%9C%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "艾奇奥匹亚之眼 (page does not exist)")）取代。

非[混沌](/index.php?title=%E6%B7%B7%E6%B2%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "混沌 (page does not exist)")阵营的玩家可能需要考虑在执行[谋杀](/index.php?title=%E8%B0%8B%E6%9D%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "谋杀 (page does not exist)")后戴上该头盔，这取决于玩家能否轻松地恢复内在心灵感应。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[3.7.0](/wiki/3.7.0 "3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 28ed8e79](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/28ed8e79622ec6596eb59d642788a7f8375e78c8)和[commit 969c87c0](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/969c87c0a169d87295fe2b4e914acfae84e01057)，现在外在心灵感应的作用范围不再是固定值，而是8\*sqrt(n)（*n*为外在心灵感应的来源个数），由神器赋予，不来自其[基础物品](/index.php?title=%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "基础物品 (page does not exist)")特性的心灵感应来源也计算在其中。

### 鉴定

感知头盔的基础价和其他两种随机外观魔法头盔（[卓越](/wiki/%E5%8D%93%E8%B6%8A%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "卓越头盔")和[敌对阵营](/wiki/%E6%95%8C%E5%AF%B9%E9%98%B5%E8%90%A5%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "敌对阵营头盔")）相同，均为50 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN")。

虽然戴上感知头盔不会自动鉴定它，但如果你未[失明](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%B1%E6%98%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "失明 (page does not exist)")，它的效果非常显而易见。你只需在戴上头盔后，通过[远观](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%9C%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "远观 (page does not exist)")命令检视附近你原本无法看见的，非[无心智](/index.php?title=%E6%97%A0%E5%BF%83%E6%99%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "无心智 (page does not exist)")的怪物，若你没有其他心灵感应来源（如[感知护身符](/wiki/%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5%E6%8A%A4%E8%BA%AB%E7%AC%A6 "感知护身符")），那么头盔就是感知头盔。内在[怪物探测](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物探测 (page does not exist)")可能会影响你的判断，但你可以通过“怪物是如何被看见的”这一信息来确定你是否有心灵感应。

## 历史

感知头盔于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Helm_of_telepathy/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a helm of telepathy will produce a [dwarvish iron helm](/wiki/Dwarvish_iron_helm "Dwarvish iron helm"), and upgrading a dwarvish iron helm has a 1⁄2 chance of producing a helm of telepathy.

[The Crown of Saint Edward](/wiki/The_Crown_of_Saint_Edward "The Crown of Saint Edward") is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") helm of telepathy that serves as the [Yeoman](/wiki/Yeoman "Yeoman") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact"), and also provides [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"). It is possible to informally identify a helm of telepathy by [attempting to name a magical helm](/wiki/Naming_artifacts "Naming artifacts") "The Crown of Saint Edward" and seeing if it succeeds.

[Grund's Stronghold](/wiki/Grund%27s_Stronghold "Grund's Stronghold") has a 1⁄3 chance of a blessed helm of telepathy generating within a [chest](/wiki/Chest "Chest") in a hidden portion of the level's southwest corner.

### SporkHack

In [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack"), it is possible for the helm of telepathy to have the randomized appearance of a [tin foil hat](/wiki/Tin_foil_hat "Tin foil hat") - tin foil hats protect you from the psychic blasts employed by [mind flayers](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer"), but also block your own sources of telepathy, including the helm's telepathy should this occur.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the helm of telepathy grants 1 AC, 1 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and telepathy while worn, and its weight is reduced to 30 aum. It can appear in [band](/index.php?title=Band_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Band (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") form as a "tiara of telepathy".

[The All-seeing Eye of the Fly](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_All-seeing_Eye_of_the_Fly "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful large-sized [intelligent artifact](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") helm of telepathy that [Baalzebub](/index.php?title=Baalzebub_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Baalzebub (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") will always generate with. While worn by a character, it grants passive monster detection, and using far look on monsters will show their [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") breakdown as well as their current inventory. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") the artifact lets you cast an area-of-effect "death spell", which is flavored as a disintegration field and acts similarly to the effect of breaking a [wand of death](/wiki/Wand_of_death "Wand of death").

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a helm of telepathy can be created at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") by combining a plain [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet") and an amulet of ESP.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, [Dantalion](/wiki/Dantalion "Dantalion") is generated with a helm of telepathy when summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the telepathy [object property](/wiki/Object_property "Object property") cannot generate on helms due to the helm of telepathy existing.

[Illithid](/wiki/Illithid_\(starting_race\) "Illithid (starting race)") characters that use their [psionic wave](/index.php?title=Psionic_wave\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Psionic wave (page does not exist)") ability while wearing a [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") or non-[metallic](/wiki/Metallic "Metallic") helm of telepathy have a 1⁄4 chance of the helm focusing the attack and increasing its damage by d6+2.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading a tinfoil hat will produce a helm of telepathy and vice versa.

The Crown of Saint Edward is made of [steel](/wiki/Steel "Steel") so that it can be safely worn by [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") Yeomen.

Grund's Stronghold retains the chance of generating a blessed helm of telepathy in the chest within the hidden area in the southwest.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 470](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/objects.c#L470)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 159](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L159)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 193](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L193)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 219](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L219)

感知头盔（helm of telepathy）是NetHack中的一种头盔类防具。它是由铁制成的魔法防具，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
    • 3.1 鉴定
  • 4 历史

    • 5.1 SLASH'EM

生成

玩家怪物生成时有7⁄200（3.5%）的概率获得一件感知头盔[2]。医生和牧师职业的玩家怪物的起始头盔有3⁄8的概率被替换成感知头盔，因此他们生成时获得感知头盔的总概率约为39.69%[3][4]。

描述

感知头盔的基础AC加成为1，并提供外在心灵感应。穿戴头盔不会自动鉴定之。虽然在功能上是增强心灵的，感知头盔仍和其他金属头盔一样会阻碍施法。

策略

主条目：心灵感应

外在心灵感应对于飞升套件而言有一定实用性，但并不是必需的，没有必要在其上耗费许愿。不过，感知头盔常常被一些能提供同样特质的任务神器（例如岩德至尊白金卡和艾奇奥匹亚之眼）取代。

非混沌阵营的玩家可能需要考虑在执行谋杀后戴上该头盔，这取决于玩家能否轻松地恢复内在心灵感应。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit 28ed8e79和commit 969c87c0，现在外在心灵感应的作用范围不再是固定值，而是8*sqrt(n)（n为外在心灵感应的来源个数），由神器赋予，不来自其基础物品特性的心灵感应来源也计算在其中。

鉴定

感知头盔的基础价和其他两种随机外观魔法头盔（卓越和敌对阵营）相同，均为50 zm。

虽然戴上感知头盔不会自动鉴定它，但如果你未失明，它的效果非常显而易见。你只需在戴上头盔后，通过远观命令检视附近你原本无法看见的，非无心智的怪物，若你没有其他心灵感应来源（如感知护身符），那么头盔就是感知头盔。内在怪物探测可能会影响你的判断，但你可以通过“怪物是如何被看见的”这一信息来确定你是否有心灵感应。

历史

感知头盔于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading a helm of telepathy will produce a dwarvish iron helm, and upgrading a dwarvish iron helm has a 1⁄2 chance of producing a helm of telepathy.

The Crown of Saint Edward is an artifact helm of telepathy that serves as the Yeoman quest artifact, and also provides magic resistance and half spell damage. It is possible to informally identify a helm of telepathy by attempting to name a magical helm "The Crown of Saint Edward" and seeing if it succeeds.

Grund's Stronghold has a 1⁄3 chance of a blessed helm of telepathy generating within a chest in a hidden portion of the level's southwest corner.

SporkHack

In SporkHack, it is possible for the helm of telepathy to have the randomized appearance of a tin foil hat - tin foil hats protect you from the psychic blasts employed by mind flayers, but also block your own sources of telepathy, including the helm's telepathy should this occur.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the helm of telepathy grants 1 AC, 1 DR and telepathy while worn, and its weight is reduced to 30 aum. It can appear in band form as a "tiara of telepathy".

The All-seeing Eye of the Fly is a lawful large-sized intelligent artifact helm of telepathy that Baalzebub will always generate with. While worn by a character, it grants passive monster detection, and using far look on monsters will show their DR breakdown as well as their current inventory. Invoking the artifact lets you cast an area-of-effect "death spell", which is flavored as a disintegration field and acts similarly to the effect of breaking a wand of death.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a helm of telepathy can be created at a furnace by combining a plain helmet and an amulet of ESP.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, Dantalion is generated with a helm of telepathy when summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the telepathy object property cannot generate on helms due to the helm of telepathy existing.

Illithid characters that use their psionic wave ability while wearing a mithril or non-metallic helm of telepathy have a 1⁄4 chance of the helm focusing the attack and increasing its damage by d6+2.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, upgrading a tinfoil hat will produce a helm of telepathy and vice versa.

The Crown of Saint Edward is made of steel so that it can be safely worn by elven Yeomen.

Grund's Stronghold retains the chance of generating a blessed helm of telepathy in the chest within the hidden area in the southwest.

  • [[心灵感应]]
|cost=50 |weight=50 |material=铁 }} '''感知头盔'''（helm of telepathy）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[头盔]]类[[防具]]。它是由[[铁]]制成的[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|470|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == [[玩家怪物]]生成时有{{frac|7|200}}（3.5%）的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件感知头盔{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|159|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[医生（玩家怪物）|医生]]和[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]职业的玩家怪物的起始头盔有{{frac|3|8}}的概率被替换成感知头盔，因此他们生成时获得感知头盔的总概率约为39.69%{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|193|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|219|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 感知头盔的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，并提供外在[[心灵感应]]。穿戴头盔不会[[自动鉴定]]之。虽然在功能上是增强心灵的，感知头盔仍和其他金属头盔一样会阻碍[[施法]]。 == 策略 == {{main/zh-CN|心灵感应}} 外在心灵感应对于[[飞升套件]]而言有一定实用性，但并不是必需的，没有必要在其上耗费[[许愿]]。不过，感知头盔常常被一些能提供同样特质的[[任务神器]]（例如[[岩德至尊白金卡]]和[[艾奇奥匹亚之眼]]）取代。 非[[混沌]]阵营的玩家可能需要考虑在执行[[谋杀]]后戴上该头盔，这取决于玩家能否轻松地恢复内在心灵感应。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|3.7.0|根据{{commit|28ed8e79622ec6596eb59d642788a7f8375e78c8}}和{{commit|969c87c0a169d87295fe2b4e914acfae84e01057}}，现在外在心灵感应的作用范围不再是固定值，而是8*sqrt(n)（''n''为外在心灵感应的来源个数），由神器赋予，不来自其[[基础物品]]特性的心灵感应来源也计算在其中。}} === 鉴定 === 感知头盔的基础价和其他两种随机外观魔法头盔（[[卓越头盔|卓越]]和[[敌对阵营头盔|敌对阵营]]）相同，均为50 {{cnlink|zm}}。 虽然戴上感知头盔不会自动鉴定它，但如果你未[[失明]]，它的效果非常显而易见。你只需在戴上头盔后，通过[[远观]]命令检视附近你原本无法看见的，非[[无心智]]的怪物，若你没有其他心灵感应来源（如[[感知护身符]]），那么头盔就是感知头盔。内在[[怪物探测]]可能会影响你的判断，但你可以通过“怪物是如何被看见的”这一信息来确定你是否有心灵感应。 == 历史 == 感知头盔于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] a helm of telepathy will produce a [[dwarvish iron helm]], and upgrading a dwarvish iron helm has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing a helm of telepathy. [[The Crown of Saint Edward]] is an [[artifact]] helm of telepathy that serves as the [[Yeoman]] [[quest artifact]], and also provides [[magic resistance]] and [[half spell damage]]. It is possible to informally identify a helm of telepathy by [[Naming artifacts|attempting to name a magical helm]] "The Crown of Saint Edward" and seeing if it succeeds. [[Grund's Stronghold]] has a {{frac|3}} chance of a blessed helm of telepathy generating within a [[chest]] in a hidden portion of the level's southwest corner. ===SporkHack=== In [[SporkHack]], it is possible for the helm of telepathy to have the randomized appearance of a [[tin foil hat]] - tin foil hats protect you from the psychic blasts employed by [[mind flayer]]s, but also block your own sources of telepathy, including the helm's telepathy should this occur. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], the helm of telepathy grants 1 AC, 1 [[DR]] and telepathy while worn, and its weight is reduced to 30 aum. It can appear in [[Band (dNetHack)|band]] form as a "tiara of telepathy". [[dNetHack artifacts#The All-seeing Eye of the Fly|The All-seeing Eye of the Fly]] is a lawful large-sized [[intelligent artifact]] helm of telepathy that [[Baalzebub (dNetHack)|Baalzebub]] will always generate with. While worn by a character, it grants passive monster detection, and using far look on monsters will show their [[DR]] breakdown as well as their current inventory. [[Invoking]] the artifact lets you cast an area-of-effect "death spell", which is flavored as a disintegration field and acts similarly to the effect of breaking a [[wand of death]]. ===SpliceHack=== In [[SpliceHack]], a helm of telepathy can be created at a [[furnace]] by combining a plain [[helmet]] and an amulet of ESP. ===notdNetHack=== In [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], in addition to dNetHack details, [[Dantalion]] is generated with a helm of telepathy when summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]]. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], the telepathy [[object property]] cannot generate on helms due to the helm of telepathy existing. [[Illithid (starting race)|Illithid]] characters that use their [[psionic wave]] ability while wearing a [[mithril]] or non-[[metallic]] helm of telepathy have a {{frac|4}} chance of the helm focusing the attack and increasing its damage by d6+2. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], upgrading a tinfoil hat will produce a helm of telepathy and vice versa. The Crown of Saint Edward is made of [[steel]] so that it can be safely worn by [[Elf (starting race)|elven]] Yeomen. Grund's Stronghold retains the chance of generating a blessed helm of telepathy in the chest within the hidden area in the southwest. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Helms/zh-CN|GANZHITOUKUI]]
